amendment.description: At the end of title I, add the following: SEC. 139. ANNUAL OPERATIONS AND MAINTENANCE BUDGET. The Secretary shall include operation and maintenance costs associated with sand transfer plants in the annual operations and maintenance budget of the Corps of Engineers.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Hastings (FL) amendment (A006) Failed by recorded vote: 133 - 287 (Roll no. 558).

action.text: Amendment failed in Committee of the Whole
Roll call votes on amendments in House
House amendment not agreed to: On agreeing to the Hastings (FL) amendment (A006) Failed by recorded vote: 133 - 287 (Roll no. 558).
House amendment offered/reported by : Amendment (A006) offered by Mr. Hastings (FL).
